summary: Added non-interactive ESLint setup (.eslintrc.cjs extending next/core-web-vitals with no-console guard) and .eslintignore so npm run lint no longer triggers the Next wizard.

testing.notes: `npm run lint` completed; reported 2 warnings for @next/next/no-img-element in src/components/ProjectDetailSheet.tsx.

hardcode.notes: Only lint configuration files added; no environment-dependent literals introduced.
